trans-unit.source: Provides change monitoring for SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce il monitoraggio delle modifiche per i database SQL Server.
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class wraps the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class and adds change monitoring for SQL Server-based dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> classe esegue il wrapping di ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> classe e aggiunge il monitoraggio delle modifiche per le dipendenze basate su SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class serves as a bridge between the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object and the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, il <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> classe funge da ponte tra ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> oggetto e <xref:System.Runtime.Caching> dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents an ADO.NET <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che rappresenta un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency" /> ADO.NET.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A> method binds the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event of the object in `dependency` to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> method handler.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A> metodo associa la <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> evento dell'oggetto in `dependency` per il <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> gestore del metodo.

trans-unit.source: This enables the change monitor to receive notification of changes in SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo il monitoraggio delle modifiche ricevere la notifica delle modifiche nel database di SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando si richiama il <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A> costruttore, è necessario passare un <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> oggetto come parametro.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> parameter to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> dell'oggetto, è necessario passare un <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> parametro al costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class lets you specify optional information for configuring the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore per <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> classe consente di specificare informazioni facoltative per la configurazione di <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un identificatore univoco per un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor" />.

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the change monitor.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class generates a GUID for this property.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> classe genera un GUID di questa proprietà.
